definitions.definition: At no time ; on no occasion ; in no circumstance .
examples: I finally finished, and I never do wanna do it again.
We were at the same college, but happened never to meet.

definitions.definition: Not at any other time; not on any other occasion; not previously .
Negative particle ( used to negate verbs in the simple past tense; also used absolutely ).
examples: The police say I stole the car, but I never did it.
You said you were going to mow the lawn today. – I never !

main_definition: At no time ; on no occasion ; in no circumstance .
secondary_definitions: Not at any other time; not on any other occasion; not previously .
( colloquial ) Negative particle ( used to negate verbs in the simple past tense; also used absolutely ).
